content: I have problem with contained, I setup a HAPI 5.3.0 and try to put the PlanDefinition on that but I cannot sterilization to JSON or XML using FHIR Client (I try JSON Parser and XML Parser). I try to put the JSON text with contained to HAPI Server and get it back from Server and I can see the data, so I can it is the problem of Serialization in FHIR Client? Please give me an advice with that?
You'll get good answers if you ask this in #hapi
Thanks @David Pyke , I will ask it on #hapi. I've joined this forum so I don't know where is the good place to ask
